teaser: An IMF delegation arrives in Cairo today for talks with the Egyptian government on a $4.8 billion loan. Tensions rise on the Korean Peninsula as North Korea blocks South Korean worker access to an industrial zone along the border of the two countries. And with tax day less than two weeks away, we give you some tips to avoid an audit.
byline: Mark Garrison, David Brancaccio, Noel King, Janell Burley Hofmann, Jeremy Hobson, John Sudworth, Paddy Hirsch and D Gorenstein
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, April 3, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, April 3, 2013
description: An IMF delegation arrives in Cairo today for talks with the Egyptian government on a $4.8 billion loan. Tensions rise on the Korean Peninsula as North Korea blocks South Korean worker access to an industrial zone along the border of the two countries. And with tax day less than two weeks away, we give you some tips to avoid an audit.
